SELECT COUNT(distinct EMPLOYEE_NAME ) AS TOTCNT from ( select e.* , p.project_name , p.CLIENT , p.DEV_ROLE , p.DEV_OS , p.DEV_LANGUAGE , p.DEV_DBMS , p.DEV_TOOL , p.DEV_COMMUNICATION , p.DEV_WAS , p.DEV_FRAMEWORK , p.OTHER_DETAILS from tb_employees e left join tb_projects p on e.employee_name = p.employee_name ) where 1=1
and grade IN
#{item}
and employee_name like '%'||#{employeeName}||'%'
and ADDR like '%'||#{addr}||'%'
and GRADE like '%'||#{grade}||'%'
and PROJECT_NAME like '%'||#{projectName}||'%'
and ( CLIENT like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_LANGUAGE like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_DBMS like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_TOOL like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_COMMUNICATION like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_WAS like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or DEV_FRAMEWORK like '%'||#{dev}||'%' or OTHER_DETAILS like '%'||#{dev}||'%' )
order by employee_name
